price: Sε mofa no atorᴐsԑm a, ampa sԑ (saa ara na) aman a wͻ’dii moanim kan no nso faa no atorᴐsԑm. Ͻsomafoͻ deε n’asεdeε ne sε ͻbεbͻ asεm no ho dawuro akyerεkyerε mu pefee.
arabic: وَإِن تُكَذِّبُواْ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ أُمَمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡۖ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-in tukadhibū faqad kadhaba umamun min qablikum wamā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
